front.title: Export BGP community information in IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX)

abstract.t: This draft introduces several information elements in IPFIX information model [RFC7012] to enable IPFIX [RFC7011] to export the BGP community information, including standard community defined in [RFC1997], extended community defined in [RFC4360], large community defined in [RFC8092], community container defined in [I-D.ietf-idr-wide-bgp-communities].
